# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Defined types

* [`deploy`](#deploy): Manage deployment users SSH keys

## Defined types

### `deploy`

Manage deployment users SSH keys

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `deploy` defined type.

##### `user`

Data type: `String`

Name of the user

Default value: `$title`

##### `group`

Data type: `String`

Group of the user

Default value: `$title`

##### `home`

Data type: `String`

Home directory of the user

Default value: `"/home/${title}"`

##### `system`

Data type: `Boolean`

Indicates if the user is a system user

Default value: ``true``

##### `manage_user`

Data type: `Boolean`

Indicate if the user should be managed by the module

Default value: ``true``
